summary: Successfully tested all 5 requested features for My Coach Developer PWA fix. All backend tests (10/10) and frontend tests passed. Key fixes verified: 1) New endpoint /api/coaches/{coach_id}/sessions works correctly 2) Login with email/password works 3) Review Session page does NOT crash with null checks 4) Coach name is displayed in Review Session header when available 5) Coach profile page loads sessions from API
passed_tests: GET /api/coaches/{coach_id}/sessions - Returns sessions for specific coach
GET /api/coaches/{coach_id}/sessions - Returns correct fields for frontend compatibility
POST /api/observations - Creates session with null/empty fields (null safety)
Frontend - Review Session page loads without crashes (null checks working)
Frontend - Coach name displayed in Review Session header when coach linked
Frontend - Coach Profile page loads with 5 tabs (Overview, Profile, Targets, Sessions, Reports)
Frontend - Sessions tab shows 'No observations recorded yet' when empty
Frontend - Login page works with email/password
Frontend - Coaches list page shows coach with Active status
critical_code_review_comments: Null checks in ReviewSession.jsx correctly use optional chaining (session.events || [], session.sessionParts || [], session.descriptorGroup1?.descriptors || [], event.descriptors1 || [], etc.)
Backend endpoint /api/coaches/{coach_id}/sessions includes both snake_case and camelCase fields for frontend compatibility (session_id/id, name/title, created_at/createdAt)
seed_data_creation: Test sessions created via /api/observations endpoint during testing - cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 bug fixes for Review Session page verified working: 1) /api/coaches/{coach_id}/sessions endpoint returns sessions for specific coach 2) ReviewSession.jsx has proper null checks for events, sessionParts, descriptorGroup1/2, event.descriptors1/2 3) Coach name is displayed in header when session.coachName is available. No sessions exist in preview environment but endpoint and frontend render correctly with empty data.

features_verified.review_page_null_checks: ReviewSession.jsx - NO CRASHES (loads with empty/null data)
features_verified.coach_name_in_header: Displayed when coach is linked to session - WORKING
